title: Mini-Ep 216: The Omelet Narrative
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 216: The Omelet Narrative
itunes:subtitle: Kate travels to New England and stocks up on some beloved regional foods and Doree visits her first podiatrist. Then, listeners write in about going to work after having a baby, having to increase the size of their reading font, and how to make the PER...
description:
Kate travels to New England and stocks up on some beloved regional foods and Doree visits her first podiatrist. Then, listeners write in about going to work after having a baby, having to increase the size of their reading font, and how to make the PERFECT omelet. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
  • Worth the Wait event info!
